DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation effect two different antihypertensive treatment control glucose Type II diabetic patient high blood pressure
DOC.brief_title: Effect Of Carvedilol Versus Metoprolol On Glycemic Control In Patients With Type II Diabetes And Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients screen must insulin produce Type II diabetic ( C peptide positive ) . Patients must history mild moderate hypertension ( 140179 systolic blood pressure ; 9019 diastolic blood pressure ) Patients must stable regimen ACE ( angiotensin convert enzyme ) / ARB ( angiotensin receptor blocker ) treatment alone combination treatment . Patients must stable antidiabetic regimen ( drug treat diet alone ) . Patient '' laboratory result HbA1c must 6.5 8.5 ( drug treat ) 6.5 7.5 ( diet alone ) . Exclusion criterion : Patients use betablocker therapy .
